name: I Wanna be the BHG
description:
I Wanna be the BHG is an IWBTG fangame. If you don't know what those are, check out fangam.es/intro.

A 2D precision platformer about wanting to kill a Gordo. This is a collaborative project, credits are below.

(We do not own any songs or sprites used in this game besides a few original sprites/tiles. All rights go to their respective owners)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

dono - main developer, stage designer

KittyGame - boss designer, visual and coding help

shign - guest creator, extra stage 4 designer

IanBoy141 - guest creator, extra stage 1 designer

YoYoYoDude - engine creator

All additional credits are listed in the game's readme file.
